title: Mixed-Methods Research-Based Instructional Design Scenario for Strengthening Nursing Managers' Sense of Belonging

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Targeting nursing leaders with post-pandemic online-to-in-person learning experiences, utilizing smartphone-based VR simulations

learning_goals: Learners will be able to identify at least three factors that enhance or hinder a sense of belonging in nursing education environments.
Learners will be able to directly design and implement two strategies to strengthen a sense of belonging in VR simulation environments.
Learners will be able to evaluate a sense of belonging measurement tool using a mixed-methods approach (survey + interview).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
